thread.title: PM: We have no reason to cast N Korea in bad light
thread.title_full: PM: We have no reason to cast N Korea in bad light

title: PM: We have no reason to cast N Korea in bad light
text:
More 
Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak said Malaysian has no reason to cast North Korea in bad light, in relations to the murder of Kim Jong-nam. 
"We have no reasons (to) do something that would paint the North Koreans in a bad light," said Najib when met by reporters in Kuala Lumpur today. 
Najib said this when asked to respond to North Korean ambassador Kang Chol's hard-hitting press conference today where he cast aspersions on Malaysian police investigations.
